post.body: yeah - 7lbs has moments, but unfort it was a bit of a manipulative, pandering chikflic. Some decent acting tho' eg. W. Harrelson
consider Sherwin Kaldeway, they do a decent job usually
Didn't know Backlight before your tweet. Sounds cool - though it hogs a bit of cpu and I probably couldn't spare any currently.
piney retsina tonight, pine-smokey lapsang souchong yesterday, where will we find out pine tomorrow?
Jumping right into wk this morning - too much to do today...
Saw "Seven Pounds" - rather contrived, and melodramatic, with unbelievable characters.
AAPL tanks as analysts misread the macworld pullout. A good move tho. No one else driving their agenda, and it killed xmas period sales.
TSX Fail: Tickers have died hence crazy looking portfolio data.
That's vegging - thanks ipod
Begging with some tv noise
The NY Times app on ipod touch is great... Wish all papers had such apps
Suitably tea-infused, I turn my attention to the tangled threads of my nascent start-up...
Ok must be time to get supper going
Getting tired of these constant stock market drops...
Hmm - python multi-threading to imitate AJAX... seems like I'm about to go down a rat-hole...
Not impressed with Stanza book reader. Great for books, but the nwspprs are very awkward. Old palm apps were better.
Ah man I already cleaned my car off once this year!
Amazingly crappy web experience complete, courtesy our tax$. Only needed to re-enter all my reg info 10 times, and try several browsers.
Registering on a Gov't of Cda website - this site is perhaps the most stupid thing I've used in 22 years of internet use. Just jaw dropping
leisurely saturday breakfast done, and onto afternoon o'chores adventure
Super-frikin-Frost-a-listic-expie-ala-don't-freeze-your-ass-off...
Everybody have a drink and take a seat
Nogtini for me and a gibtini for @skatem
Defining grad student research projects suitable for coming term in my co.
Active Elec: One price tag is lower than a second on item. Don't consumer laws say lowest price must be charged? Dweeb at the cash refuses
Disassembling a Casio camera for attempted diagnosis. It's an old one luckily, cause it doesn't look like it's going to work again soon.
Okay - now gonna get me some of that sleeping action. Oh yeah...
Today included High Tea at the Chateau w friends. Hard to beat hours of tea sipping, eating various stuff sweet and savory, and lotsa chat
Is it just me or is sleep really great?
Turned out that I did the cooking ironing part, but she did the tough mixing, folding and measuring part.
Watching @skatem make waffles.
Scrutinized digtl pic frames at best buy. What crappy products all! Freezing screens, unrespsv buttons, bad ui's. Early market woes?
Ok. Need food. Off to Rockwells for some eggs & bacon.
Eng brkfst tea from stocking for brkfst. No that doesn't mean I'm making tea INS sock.
Beer update: collapsed kreuzen and so I've transferee into secondary fermented to continue the process. Textbook batch this one!
Nothin homier than wearing a scruffy cardigan and lazing around on boxing day
Migraine day ugh. ( @deabush u r in good company ) Too much choco, scotch, wine, and constant eating.
Post Xmas: discovered that kodak digital picture frames are crap. Buggy firmware, poor file compatb'ty. Returng and appgz to mom. Thx kodak!
Too much to do today, and not enough time
9:00 must be time to shovel snow
